EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Tammy Dugan
Jun Wang
diff.description: Insert a task schedule (to run once a week) for archiving log files.
diff.sql: INSERT INTO scheduler_task_config (`name`, `schedulable_class`, `start_time`, `start_time_pattern`, `repeat_interval`, `start_on_startup`, `started`, `created_by`, `date_created`) SELECT 'Cron job archiving Tomcat log files','org.openmrs.module.chirdlutil.LogArchiveCron', NOW(), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss', 604800, 1, 0, 1, NOW() FROM (select count(*) as cnt from scheduler_task_config where name='Cron job archiving Tomcat log files') a WHERE a.cnt=0;
